name: DropdownMenu
desc: A dropdown menu that can be opened from a [TextField]. The selected menu item is displayed in that field.

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Determine if the [DropdownMenu] is enabled.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: Determine the width of the [DropdownMenu].

fields.name: menuHeight
fields.desc: Determine the height of the menu.

fields.name: leadingIcon
fields.desc: An optional Icon at the front of the text input field.

fields.name: trailingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon at the end of the text field.

fields.name: label
fields.desc: Optional widget that describes the input field.

fields.name: hintText
fields.desc: Text that suggests what sort of input the field accepts.

fields.name: helperText
fields.desc: Text that provides context about the [DropdownMenu]'s value, such as how the value will be used.

fields.name: errorText
fields.desc: Text that appears below the input field and the border to show the error message.

fields.name: selectedTrailingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon at the end of the text field to indicate that the text field is pressed.

fields.name: enableFilter
fields.desc: Determine if the menu list can be filtered by the text input.

fields.name: enableSearch
fields.desc: Determine if the first item that matches the text input can be highlighted.

fields.name: keyboardType
fields.desc: The type of keyboard to use for editing the text.

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: The text style for the [TextField] of the [DropdownMenu];

fields.name: textAlign
fields.desc: The text align for the [TextField] of the [DropdownMenu].

fields.name: inputDecorationTheme
fields.desc: Defines the default appearance of [InputDecoration] to show around the text field.

fields.name: menuStyle
fields.desc: The [MenuStyle] that defines the visual attributes of the menu.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: Controls the text being edited or selected in the menu.

fields.name: initialSelection
fields.desc: The value used to for an initial selection.

fields.name: onSelected
fields.desc: The callback is called when a selection is made.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: Defines the keyboard focus for this widget.

fields.name: requestFocusOnTap
fields.desc: Determine if the dropdown button requests focus and the on-screen virtual keyboard is shown in response to a touch event.

fields.name: dropdownMenuEntries
fields.desc: Descriptions of the menu items in the [DropdownMenu].

fields.name: expandedInsets
fields.desc: Defines the menu text field's width to be equal to its parent's width plus the horizontal width of the specified insets.

fields.name: filterCallback
fields.desc: When [DropdownMenu.enableFilter] is true, this callback is used to compute the list of filtered items.

fields.name: searchCallback
fields.desc: When [DropdownMenu.enableSearch] is true, this callback is used to compute the index of the search result to be highlighted.

fields.name: inputFormatters
fields.desc: Optional input validation and formatting overrides.

fields.name: alignmentOffset
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.MenuAnchor.alignmentOffset}

fields.name: closeBehavior
fields.desc: Defines the behavior for closing the dropdown menu when an item is selected.

fields.name: maxLines
fields.desc: Specifies the maximum number of lines the selected value can display in the [DropdownMenu].

fields.name: textInputAction
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.TextField.textInputAction}

nodes.name: Dropdown Menu Style Settings
desc: 【trailingIcon】 : Right icon when menu is expanded   【Widget?】
【selectedTrailingIcon】 : Right icon when menu is expanded   【Widget?】

nodes.name: Custom Menu Items for Dropdown Menu
desc: You can customize the menu items by using the labelWidget of DropdownMenuEntry.
